title: A Surge in Online Orders and a New Amazon Rival are Giving Life to Indie Bookstores
description:
Today is Friday, April 3, and we’re looking at Bookshop.org vs. Amazon.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
